^(accessKeyId)$.description: The access key ID that identifies the temporary credentials.

^(accessPoint)$.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 access point for temporary credentials related the external location.

^(secretAccessKey)$.description: The secret access key that can be used to sign AWS API requests.

^(sessionToken)$.description: The token that users must pass to AWS API to use the temporary credentials.

access_key_id.description: The access key ID that identifies the temporary credentials.

access_point.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 access point for temporary credentials related the external location.

secret_access_key.description: The secret access key that can be used to sign AWS API requests.

session_token.description: The token that users must pass to AWS API to use the temporary credentials.
